q: 41-year-old, currently Controller of BBC Global News, replaces Andy Coulson , who resigned earlier this month amid the continuing row over phone-hacking when he was editor of the News of the World. Mr David Cameron said: I am very pleased that Craig Oliver is to become the new Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street.`` Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist. He will do an excellent job in explaining and communicating the Government's programme. Mr Oliver said:`` I'm delighted to be joining David Cameron and his team at such an exciting and challenging time.`` It's difficult to leave the BBC after a fascinating few years

senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Data Warehouse Appliance Promises Database Transparence, Mixed BI Workload, Massive Scalability Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. But, as Donald Rumsfeld writes, he's never much of a handwringer, I don't spend a lot of time in recriminations, looking back or second-guessing decisions made in real time with imperfect information by myself or others. As seems typical of so much here, that's partially true; the author has no taste for self-criticism or second-guessing himself. Masterful bureaucratic survivor that he was until he ran out of room to maneuver

former Dick Armey Jim Ryun , R-Kansas, offered his help in collecting signatures from conservatives and tea party activists to encourage Mike Pence to get into the race. Mike Pence thanked those who had encouraged him, but added: While we may have been able to seek the presidency, we believe our best opportunity to continue to serve the conservative values that brought us to public life is right here in Indiana. But it would have been an uphill climb. No sitting member of the House of Representatives has won the presidency since James Garfield in 1880. And he's been mired in the bottom of polls

Reorganization`` We each bring incredible assets to the table,'' Stephen Elop , Nokia's chief executive, and Steve Ballmer , Microsoft's chief executive, said in a joint statement. Nokia's history of innovation in the hardware space, global hardware scale, strong history of intellectual property creation and navigation assets are second to none. Microsoft is a leader in software and services; the company's incredible expertise in platform creation forms the opportunity for its billions of customers and millions of partners to get more out of their devices. At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said.`` I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy.
